00032 // page title

00034 // get id from url
00035 $biblioID = 0;
00036 if (isset($_GET['biblioID']) AND !empty($_GET['biblioID'])) {
00037     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00038 }
00039 
00040 // start the output buffer
00041 ob_start();
00042 // iframe blocker
00043 if (isset($_GET['block'])) {
00044     echo '<div id="blocker" style="position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #CCCCCC; opacity: 0.3;">&nbsp;</div>';

00047 <script type="text/javascript">
00048 function confirmProcess(int_biblio_id, int_file_id, str_file_name)
00049 {
00050     // confirmation to remove file from repository
00051     var confirmBox = confirm('Are you sure to remove the file attachment data?');
00052     if (confirmBox) {
00053         // set hidden element value
00054         var confirmBox2 = confirm('Do you also want to remove ' + str_file_name + ' file from repository?');
00055         if (confirmBox2) {
00056             document.hiddenActionForm.alsoDeleteFile.value = '1';
00057         }
00058         document.hiddenActionForm.bid.value = int_biblio_id;
00059         document.hiddenActionForm.remove.value = int_file_id;
00060         // submit form
00061         document.hiddenActionForm.submit();
00062     }
00063 }
00064 </script>
00065 <?php
00066 /* main content */
00067 // temporary attachment removal
00068 if (isset($_GET['removesess'])) {
00069     $idx = (integer)$_GET['removesess'];
00070     // remove file from filesystem
00071     @unlink(REPO_BASE_DIR.str_replace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $_SESSION['biblioAttach'][$idx]['file_dir']).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$_SESSION['biblioAttach'][$idx]['file_name']);
00072     // remove session array
00073     unset($_SESSION['biblioAttach'][$idx]);
00074     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00075     echo 'alert(\''.__('Attachment removed!').'\');';
00076     echo 'location.href = \'iframe_attach.php\';';
00077     echo '</script>';
00078 }
00079 
00080 if (isset($_POST['bid']) AND isset($_POST['remove'])) {
00081     $bid = (integer)$_POST['bid'];
00082     $file = (integer)$_POST['remove'];
00083     // query file data from database
00084     $file_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_id='.$file);
00085     $file_d = $file_q->fetch_assoc();
00086     // attachment data delete
00087     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00088     $sql_op->delete('biblio_attachment', "file_id=$file AND biblio_id=$bid");
00089 
00090     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00091     if ($_POST['alsoDeleteFile'] == '1') {
00092         // remove file from repository and filesystem
00093         @unlink(REPO_BASE_DIR.str_replace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $file_d['file_dir']).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$file_d['file_name']);
00094         echo 'alert(\'Attachment '.$file_d['file_name'].' succesfully removed!\');';
00095     }
00096     echo 'location.href = \'iframe_attach.php?biblioID='.$bid.'\';';
00097     echo '</script>';
00098 }
00099 
00100 // if biblio ID is set
00101 if ($biblioID) {
00102     $table = new simbio_table();
00103     $table->table_attr = 'align="center" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00104 
00105     // database list
00106     $biblio_attach_q = $dbs->query('SELECT att.*,fl.* FROM biblio_attachment AS att
00107         LEFT JOIN files AS fl ON att.file_id=fl.file_id WHERE biblio_id='.$biblioID);
00108 
00109     $row = 1;
00110     $row_class = 'alterCell2';
00111     while ($biblio_attach_d = $biblio_attach_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00112         // alternate the row color
00113         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00114 
00115         // remove link
00116         $remove_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$biblioID.', '.$biblio_attach_d['file_id'].', \''.$biblio_attach_d['file_name'].'\')"
00117             style="color: #FF0000; text-decoration: underline;">Delete</a>';
00118 
00119         // edit link
00120         $edit_link = '<a href="javascript: openWin(\''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/pop_attach.php?biblioID='.$biblioID.'&fileID='.$biblio_attach_d['file_id'].'\', \'popAttach\', 600, 300, true)">Edit</a>';
00121 
00122         // file link
00123         if (preg_match('@(video|audio|image)/.+@i', $biblio_attach_d['mime_type'])) {
00124             $file = '<a href="#" onclick="parent.openHTMLpop(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'index.php?p=multimediastream&fid='.$biblio_attach_d['file_id'].'&bid='.$biblio_attach_d['biblio_id'].'\', 400, 300, \''.$biblio_attach_d['file_title'].'\')">'.$biblio_attach_d['file_title'].'</a>';
00125         } else {
00126             $file = '<a href="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/view.php?fid='.urlencode($biblio_attach_d['file_id']).'" target="_blank">'.$biblio_attach_d['file_title'].'</a>';
00127         }
00128 
00129         $table->appendTableRow(array($remove_link, $edit_link, $file, $biblio_attach_d['file_desc']));
00130         $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 5%;"');
00131         $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 5%;"');
00132         $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="width: 40%;"');
00133         $table->setCellAttr($row, 3, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="width: 50%;"');
00134 
00135         $row++;
00136     }
00137     echo $table->printTable();
00138     // hidden form
00139     echo '<form name="hiddenActionForm" method="post" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'"><input type="hidden" name="bid" value="0" /><input type="hidden" name="remove" value="0" /><input type="hidden" name="alsoDeleteFile" value="0" /></form>';
00140 } else {
00141     if ($_SESSION['biblioAttach']) {
00142         $table = new simbio_table();
00143         $table->table_attr = 'align="center" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00144 
00145         $row = 1;
00146         $row_class = 'alterCell2';
00147         foreach ($_SESSION['biblioAttach'] as $idx=>$biblio_session) {
00148             // remove link
00149             $remove_link = '<a href="iframe_attach.php?removesess='.$idx.'" style="color: #000000; text-decoration: underline;">Remove</a>';
00150 
00151             $table->appendTableRow(array($remove_link, $biblio_session['file_name'], $biblio_session['last_update']));
00152             $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; background-color: #ffc466; width: 10%;"');
00153             $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="background-color: #ffc466; width: 60%;"');
00154             $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="background-color: #ffc466; width: 30%;"');
00155 
00156             $row++;
00157         }
00158         echo $table->printTable();
00159     }
00160 }
00161 /* main content end */
00162 $content = ob_get_clean();
